functions.short: Get the Facing from integer ID
functions.description:
Gets the associated facing based on the id

Values:
0 - Down
1 - Up
2 - North
3 - South
4 - West
5 - East

functions.short: Get the Facing from its Name
functions.description: Gets the associated facing based on the name, should be lower case

functions.short: Get the Facing from its first letter
functions.description: Gets the associated facing based on the first letter of the name, should be lower case
